definition: to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem

sentences.english: There was no recurrence after six months of follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 術後經六個月追蹤沒有復發的情形。

sentences.english: However, soon after that, she has a relapse of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是不久，滴發現她的乳癌居然復發。

sentences.english: Because embolus can fall off repeatedly, have a relapse easily so.
sentences.chinese: 由於栓子可以反覆脫落，所以容易復發。

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆經手術成功切除腫瘤且未再復發。

sentences.english: The main cause of treatment failure was local recurrence and distant metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 局部復發和遠處轉移是治療失敗的主要原因。

sentences.english: Conclusion Consolidate of anisometropia amblyopia have been cured is found to arrest palindromia.
sentences.chinese: 結論屈光參差性弱視治癒後的鞏固是預防復發的根本。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the palindromic reason and treatment of excision of intracranial tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱內腫瘤術後復發的原因及其治療方法。

sentences.english: A positive family history is a risk factor for recurrence and for contralateral patellofemoral instability.
sentences.chinese: 陽性家族史是復發和對側髕股不穩定的危險因素。

sentences.english: Objective To study the recurrent mechanism and prognosis of primary retroperitoneal liposarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討原發性腹膜後脂肪肉瘤復發的機理及預後。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the recurrent reasons about tubercular goiters after operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探討結節性甲狀腺腫術後復發的原因。

sentences.english: All patients were treated with a full course of postoperative antibiotic treatment. No cases of recurrent infection were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 術後所有患者給予全程抗生素治療，無感染復發。

sentences.english: The extent of surgical depletion was believed to be approp…
sentences.chinese: 認爲本術的切除範圍有利於預防腫瘤的局部復發。

sentences.english: Post-operative 30-month follow up showed no local recurrence of the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 手術後30個月追蹤並無腫瘤復發之跡象。

sentences.english: No infection reoccurrence was found at the last time of followup.
sentences.chinese: 在最後隨訪兩組均沒有感染復發的病例。

sentences.english: Well, first, addiction is exceedingly difficult to treat and devastatingly subject to relapse.
sentences.chinese: 首先，成癮症極度難以治療，而且極度容易復發。

sentences.english: John Terry has not had a relapse.

definition: (of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement
